markdownRemark.html: Featuring two hundred and eighty-five works collected by the MPM collection encompass Picasso's revolutionary innovations, as well as the wide variety of styles, materials and techniques he used. Audio commentary is free and a must. The museum features work that Picasso kept private within his family.

frontmatter.title: Museo Picasso Málaga
frontmatter.description: Museo Picasso Málaga - Featuring two hundred and eighty-five works collected by the MPM collection encompass Picasso's revolutionary innovations, as well as the wide variety of styles, materials and techniques he used. Audio commentary is free and a must. The museum features work that Picasso kept private within his family.
frontmatter.address: Palacio de Buenavista, Calle San Agustín, 8, 29015 Málaga
frontmatter.price: Pablo Picasso New Collection 8.00 euro, Temporary exhibition 6.50 euro, For both 12.00 euro. Reduced rates for over 65s, holders of the Euro Youth Card and accredited students under 26 years of age.
